```{r,echo=FALSE,fig.height=3,fig.width=3}

data.frame(
    header = c(
        "Pediatric Drug Safety Database",
        "Pediatric Drug Safety portal"
        ),
    title = c(
        "R data package for downloading and extracting drug safety signals during childhood",
        "Web application for accessing drug safety signals during childhood"
        ),
    tags = c(
        "package",
        "app"
    ),
    link = c(
        "http://nickg.bio/PDSdatabase/",
        "https://pdsportal.shinyapps.io/pdsportal/"
    ),
    image = c(
        "images/db.png",
        "images/computer.png"
    )
) |>
    bs4cards::cards(
        title = title,
        header = header,
        tags = paste0("all; ",tags),
        link = link,
        image = image,
        width = 1,
        border_width=1,
        layout = "label-right",
        spacing=1
    )
```
